FuncDef: This command specifies the data encapsulation for an ATM PVCC delimited Epipe SAP. The definition references RFC 2684,Multiprotocol Encapsulation over ATM AAL5,and to the ATM Forum LAN Emulation specification. Ingress traffic that does not match the configured encapsulation will be dropped.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the encapsulation type. Values-aal5snap-bridged - Bridged encapsulation for LLC encapsulated circuit (LLC/SNAP precedes protocol datagram) as defined in RFC 2684..
